cs4620.ray1

Class IntersectionRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs4620.ray1.IntersectionRecord

  • public class IntersectionRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is really just a struct, holding necessary information about a particular intersection point.
    Author:
    ags

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Vector3d location
      The location where the intersection occurred.
      Vector3d normal
      The normal of the surface at the intersection location.
      Surface surface
      A reference to the actual surface.
      double t
      The t value along the ray at which the intersection occurred.
      Vector2d texCoords
      The texture coordinates of the intersection point
